mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (cno, pno, content, writer, password) VALUES (seq_comment.nextval, #{pno}, #{comment}, #{writer}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT cno, pno, content as comment, writer, regDate, updatedate FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_ASC(tbl_comment pk_comment) */ rownum as rn, cno, pno, content, writer, regDate, updatedate FROM tbl_comment WHERE pno = #{pno} )
